p: The following antibodies were used for Western-blotting: β-actin (A2066; Sigma), gB (6506; Abcam), p-ERK (4370; cell signaling) and p-IκBα (9246; Cell Signaling). Mitoxantrone dihydrochloride was purchased from sigma (M6545). HSV-1 ICP6 polyclonal antibody was generated against the N-terminal peptide of ICP6. TNF-α recombinant protein was generated according to previously instruction [ 38].
